generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Comfortaa&family=Kaushan+Script&family=Oswald&display=swap");*{box-sizing:border-box}h1,h2,h3,h5{font-family:Kaushan Script,sans-serif;font-size:32px}p{font-family:Comfortaa,sans-serif;font-size:20px}h3{color:var(--primary-variant)}a{transition:all .4s ease}body{background-color:var(--background);color:var(--on-background)}.container{min-height:100vh;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;flex-direction:column;max-width:1200px;width:100%;margin:0 auto;padding:0 10px}.marked-text{background-color:var(--primary-color);padding:1px 3px}.nav__toggler{width:30px;height:30px;display:none;position:relative;cursor:pointer}.nav__toggler:before{top:10px}.nav__toggler:after,.nav__toggler:before{content:"";display:block;width:30px;height:5px;background-color:var(--primary-color);position:absolute;left:0;transition:all .5s ease-in-out}.nav__toggler:after{top:25px}.nav{transition:.6s;padding:20px 40px;left:0;top:0;position:fixed;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;z-index:100;width:100vw;font-family:Oswald,sans-serif;background:var(--on-primary);box-shadow:1px 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.nav.sticky{padding:3px 40px}.nav__link{text-decoration:none;color:var(--primary-variant);margin-right:10px;font-weight:900;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:30px}.nav__link:hover{color:var(--on-background)}.text-marked{font-style:italic;font-weight:900}.btn{padding:12px 24px;text-decoration:none;border-radius:20px;background-color:var(--primary-variant);color:#fff;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:900;font-family:Oswald,sans-serif;margin-top:50px;display:inline-block;text-align:center;box-shadow:1px 5px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5);transition:all .3s ease-in-out}.btn__link{padding:4px 10px;font-size:14px}.btn__link:nth-child(2){margin-left:45px}.btn:active{box-shadow:0 0 0}.tech-tools{color:var(--primary-variant)}.main-offer{padding:0 10px}.main-offer__tilte{font-size:50px;width:320px;font-family:sans-serif;transform:translateX(400px);opacity:0}.main-offer.active .main-offer__tilte{transform:translateX(0);opacity:1;animation:showTitle 1.5s ease-in-out forwards}@keyframes showTitle{0%{transform:translateX(400px);opacity:0}to{transform:translateX(0);opacity:1}}.main-offer__tilte_name{font-size:50px;color:var(--primary-variant)}.changed-content{opacity:0;transform:translateY(300px)}.main-offer.active .changed-content{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0);animation:showContent 1.5s ease-in-out forwards}.main-offer__btn{opacity:0;transform:translateX(-400px)}.main-offer.active .main-offer__btn{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0);animation:showBtn 1.2s ease-in-out forwards}@keyframes showContent{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateY(300px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes showBtn{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(-400px)}50%{opacity:.5}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}.changed-content__wrapper{overflow:hidden;display:inline-block;width:180px;padding:0 5px;height:36px;margin-bottom:-4px;background-color:var(--primary-color);text-align:center}.changed-content__title{font-weight:700;font-style:italic;text-align:center}.arrow-go-home{position:fixed;bottom:10vh;right:10vh;width:60px;height:60px;border-radius:50%;background-color:var(--primary-variant);display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;color:#fff;text-decoration:none;border:3px solid hsla(0,0%,100%,.5);opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transition:all .5s ease-in-out;font-family:Oswald,sans-serif}.arrow-go-home.show{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.social-icons{padding:50px;display:flex;justify-content:space-around;width:100%}.social-icons__link{font-size:50px;cursor:pointer;color:var(--primary-color);margin-right:10px}.mail-link{font-size:28px;text-decoration:none;color:var(--primary-color)}.mail-link:hover,.social-icons__link:hover{color:var(--on-background)}@media (max-width:575px){.container{max-width:90%}}@media (max-width:767px){.container{max-width:540px}.nav{padding:10px 40px}.nav__menu{padding-top:20vh;visibility:0;display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:100vh;width:100vw;background:var(--background);transition:all .5s ease}.nav__link,.nav__menu{opacity:0;transform:translateX(400px)}.nav__link{margin-bottom:30px}@keyframes fadeIn{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateX(100%)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}.nav.active .nav__link{transform:translateX(0)}.nav.active .nav__menu{transform:translateX("0px");opacity:1;visibility:1;transform:translateX(0)}.nav__toggler{display:block}.nav.active .nav__toggler:after{transform:rotate(-45deg) translateY(-11px)}.nav.active .nav__toggler:before{transform:rotate(45deg) translateY(10px)}}@media (max-width:991px){.container{max-width:720px}}@media (max-width:1199px){.container{max-width:960px}}@media (max-width:1200px){.container{max-width:1140px}}
